con:part.con:content: <definitions name="TransactionWSDL" targetNamespace="http://bank/TransactionWSDL" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://bank/TransactionWSDL" xmlns:ns="http://bank/schema/WSCommonTypes" xmlns:plnk="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/plnktype" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://bank/TransactionWSDL"> <xsd:import namespace="http://bank/schema/WSCommonTypes" schemaLocation="WSCommonTypes.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="CheckAccountRequest"> <part name="CheckAccountRequest" element="ns:CheckAccountRequest"/> </message> <message name="CheckAccountResponse"> <part name="CheckAccountResponse" element="ns:CheckAccountResponse"/> </message> <message name="TransactRequest"> <part name="TransactRequest" element="ns:TransactRequest"/> </message> <message name="TransactResponse"> <part name="TransactResponse" element="ns:TransactResponse"/> </message> <message name="ErrorResponse"> <part name="ErrorResponse" element="ns:ErrorResponse"/> </message> <portType name="TransactionWSDLPortType"> <operation name="CheckAccount"> <input name="input1" message="tns:CheckAccountRequest"/> <output name="output1" message="tns:CheckAccountResponse"/> <fault name="fault1" message="tns:ErrorResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="Transact"> <input name="input2" message="tns:TransactRequest"/> <output name="output2" message="tns:TransactResponse"/> <fault name="fault2" message="tns:ErrorResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="TransactionWSDLBinding" type="tns:TransactionWSDLPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="CheckAccount"> <soap:operation/> <input name="input1"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output name="output1"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault1"> <soap:fault name="fault1" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="Transact"> <soap:operation/> <input name="input2"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output name="output2"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault2"> <soap:fault name="fault2" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="TransactionWSDLService"> <port name="TransactionWSDLPort" binding="tns:TransactionWSDLBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:${HttpDefaultPort}/TransactionWSDLService/TransactionWSDLPort"/> </port> </service> <plnk:partnerLinkType name="TransactionWSDL"> <plnk:role name="TransactionWSDLPortTypeRole" portType="tns:TransactionWSDLPortType"/> </plnk:partnerLinkType> </definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://bank/schema/WSCommonTypes" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://bank/schema/WSCommonTypes"> <xsd:element name="CheckAccountRequest" type="tns:CheckAccountRequest"/> <xsd:element name="CheckAccountResponse" type="tns:CheckAccountResponse"/> <xsd:element name="TransactRequest" type="tns:TransactRequest"/> <xsd:element name="TransactResponse" type="tns:TransactResponse"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorResponse" type="tns:ErrorResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="CheckAccountRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Surname" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Passport" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CheckAccountResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Status" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TransactRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AccountNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Sum" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="Target" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TransactResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransactionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="TransactionStatus" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ErrorResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorString" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

con:mockOperation.name: CheckAccount
Transact
